Translations.Text: S igenni bu idurra
Kunwi temgarradem $ef wawal
Iooa t win iooan
Tameppant i ikeddaben
Nitni, di maylellif, stehzan
steqsayen: "anda t wass uqeiii
Ass ideg, ara ppuhewlen di tmes
Jeoobet ahewwel nnwen agi i$ef tearem
Ih, wid ipeezziben, di leonanat akked tliwa
Iifen ayen i sen Ifka Mass nnsen. Ih, nitni llan, iu$ leal, d lauuam
Deg iv, cwii ay gganen
Di tafrara, nitni ste$fioen
deg wayla nnsen: amur i umappar akked ume$bun
U di tmurt, issekniyen i wid ipputebbten
Llant deg iman nnwen. Aani ur tepwalim ara
U deg igenni, ooeeq nnwen, akked wayen i wen ippuwaaaden
S Mass n tmurt akked igenwan, ar neppa d tidep, am akken kunwi tepmeslayem
Ma tebbwev ik id tedyant inebgawen ukyisen n Iboahim
Kecmen $uoes, nnan as: "tifrat"! Inna: "tifrat a wid ur nessin
Inser ar twacult is, ibbwi d aajmi iqebbwan
Iqeob asen t id; inna: "day ur teppeppem ara
Ieus iugad iten. Nnan as: "ur ppagwad"! D$a beccoen t s uqcic amusnaw
Tqeob ed tmeiiut is, tsu$, tewwet deg udem is, tenna d: "tam$aot tiaiqeot
Nnan: "akka id Inna Mass im. Ih, Neppa, d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
